title: What is the Paris tennis schedule?
description: The final ATP Masters 1000 of the season, the Rolex Paris Masters, continues Tuesday with a thrilling order of play. Among the stars who will play are second seed Carlos Alcaraz and home favourite Arthur Fils. View the full Tuesday order of play below to see who is competing, on which court, and when they are scheduled. [ATP APP]  ORDER OF PLAY - TUESDAY, 29 OCTOBER 2024 COURT CENTRAL start 11 a.m. First Round - Arthur Fils (FRA) vs [PR] Marin Cilic (CRO) First Round - [14] Frances Tiafoe (USA) vs [WC] Giovanni Mpetshi Perricard (FRA) First Round - [LL] Zizou Bergs (BEL) vs [WC] Richard Gasquet (FRA) Not Before 7 p.m. Second Round - Nicolas Jarry (CHI) vs [2] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) Not Before 8:30 p.m. Second Round - [7] Casper Ruud (NOR) vs Jordan Thompson (AUS) COURT 1 start 11 a.m. First Round - Jan-Lennard Struff (GER) vs [16] Lorenzo Musetti (ITA) Second Round - Francisco Cerundolo (ARG) vs [6] Andrey Rublev First Round - Matteo Arnaldi (ITA) vs [13] Holger Rune (DEN) Not Before 3:30 p.m. First Round - Ben Shelton (USA) vs [Q] Corentin Moutet (FRA) Second Round - [10] Stefanos Tsitsipas (GRE) vs Alejandro Tabilo (CHI) COURT 2 start 11 a.m. Alex Michelsen (USA) vs [12] Hubert Hurkacz (POL) Alexei Popyrin (AUS) vs Matteo Berrettini (ITA) Karen Khachanov vs [PR] Pablo Carreno Busta (ESP) Not Before 3:30 p.m. [9] Alex de Minaur (AUS) vs Mariano Navone (ARG) Jack Draper (GBR) vs Jiri Lehecka (CZE) [3] Rohan Bopanna (IND) / Matthew Ebden (AUS) vs Marcelo Melo (BRA) / Alexander Zverev (GER) [NEWSLETTER FORM]

Paris

Learn who is playing each day and on what court at the ATP Masters 1000 event

October 29, 2024

AFP/Getty Images

The Rolex Paris Masters is the final ATP Masters 1000 event of the season. By ATP Staff

The final ATP Masters 1000 of the season, the Rolex Paris Masters, continues Tuesday with a thrilling order of play. Among the stars who will play are second seed Carlos Alcaraz and home favourite Arthur Fils.

View the full Tuesday order of play below to see who is competing, on which court, and when they are scheduled.

 

ORDER OF PLAY - TUESDAY, 29 OCTOBER 2024

COURT CENTRAL start 11 a.m.
First Round - Arthur Fils (FRA) vs [PR] Marin Cilic (CRO)
First Round - [14] Frances Tiafoe (USA) vs [WC] Giovanni Mpetshi Perricard (FRA)
First Round - [LL] Zizou Bergs (BEL) vs [WC] Richard Gasquet (FRA)

Not Before 7 p.m.
Second Round - Nicolas Jarry (CHI) vs [2] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP)

Not Before 8:30 p.m.
Second Round - [7] Casper Ruud (NOR) vs Jordan Thompson (AUS)

COURT 1 start 11 a.m.
First Round - Jan-Lennard Struff (GER) vs [16] Lorenzo Musetti (ITA)
Second Round - Francisco Cerundolo (ARG) vs [6] Andrey Rublev
First Round - Matteo Arnaldi (ITA) vs [13] Holger Rune (DEN)

Not Before 3:30 p.m.
First Round - Ben Shelton (USA) vs [Q] Corentin Moutet (FRA)
Second Round - [10] Stefanos Tsitsipas (GRE) vs Alejandro Tabilo (CHI)

COURT 2 start 11 a.m.
Alex Michelsen (USA) vs [12] Hubert Hurkacz (POL)
Alexei Popyrin (AUS) vs Matteo Berrettini (ITA)
Karen Khachanov vs [PR] Pablo Carreno Busta (ESP)

Not Before 3:30 p.m.
[9] Alex de Minaur (AUS) vs Mariano Navone (ARG)
Jack Draper (GBR) vs Jiri Lehecka (CZE)
[3] Rohan Bopanna (IND) / Matthew Ebden (AUS) vs Marcelo Melo (BRA) / Alexander Zverev (GER)
